channel.title: Dueling
channel.description: Can someone help me add duel to my server. Like the one on devolution 7.0 Add Right Click (DUEL ANYWHERE}. Or is it even possible?

item.title: Dueling
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“bl00d filthy, post:3, topic:290980”]If you’re saying “I haven’t looked” i have. I haven’t found any tuts for “right click” dueling… So don’t assume i didn’t look if i did.[/quote]That still doesn’t matter.

[quote=“Unknown Supreme, post:2, topic:290980”][quote author=Taharok]3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Supreme Unknown Supreme
item.description:
@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

Try searching, I found three tuts like this already. And by the way, it’s obviously possible if you found one on another server…

Taharok:

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.
